ComicInfo.Summary: Imprisoned like an animal, tortured by the lover of the man he slaughtered, the HellSpawn Covenant has found a way to temporarily restore his Hell-born strength. Meanwhile, in the Northern Woods, Gareth's fears have turned to an unbelievable discovery that could mean the end for the Druid and his Iceni protector.
ComicInfo.Title: Sins of the Hellspawn
